entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
